root.name: Bee 52
root.description: OverviewYou control a bee whose only purpose in life is to collect honey to please his Queen. In this horizontal side-scroller you avoid ants, grasshoppers and hornets. Power-ups are also available.Critical ReceptionWhen the NES version was released Electronic Gaming Monthly issued the following scores, 5,7,5,6 adding, "...definitely not for the hard core player...the graphics leave a lot to be desired but the control and game play are right on the money. If the game offered more variety it could have been a real hit".
